data.message:
Hello
My account has been disabled Can you help recover it?
my email
I sent a copy of the passport to confirm that I am the owner of the account but have not responded yet

replies.message: Hey there. Here are possible reasons why your account may have been disabled: http://bit.ly/2zVMjbZ. If you believe that it was disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2lBZJY8. If you've already filed an appeal, please sit tight while we review it. -Kiara
have provided a copy of my ID card and passport but the reply has not yet been received. Please reply to my message on Messenger to send the disabled account information Thank you

Facebook I can not access the Hotmail account to reply to the message from you
Please help. I forgot my password
